known_issues: Text should be visible in the downside/bottom area, but currently is not visible.

existing_features.title: Update the selected `<main>` element in `frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx` (XPath `/html/body/div/div/main`) so that content at the bottom of pages rendered inside `<Outlet />` is not obscured by the fixed mobile bottom navigation and remains readable/visible on small screens.

projectName: Ensure bottom-of-page text remains visible in main content area
